content: शशः {@--1@} A hare, rabbit; <ls>Ms. 3. 270</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 18.</ls> {@--2@} The spots on the moon (which are popularly considered to resemble the form of a hare). {@--3@} One of the four classes into which men are divided by erotic writers; thus defined: --मृदुवचनसुशीलः कोमलांगः सुकेशः सकलगुणनिधानं सत्यवादी शशोऽयं <ls>Śabdak.</ls>; see <ls>Ratimañjarī 35</ls> also. {@--4@} The Lodhra tree. {@--5@} Gum-myrrh.
